message.content:
cs.CG, cs.DS, cs.LG, cs.DM, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with shape fitting problems, which are often studied in computational geometry (cs.CG). The use of $\epsilon$-coresets is a common technique in data structures (cs.DS) and machine learning (cs.LG) to efficiently approximate solutions to optimization problems. The paper also discusses total sensitivity, which is a measure of the stability of an algorithm, and is relevant to both data management (cs.DM) and social networks (cs.SI).
